description: Describes the content, creation time, and security configuration of an Amazon SageMaker Model Card.

parameters.name: ModelCardName
parameters.description: The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the model card to describe.

nested_items.name: ModelCardArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the model card.

nested_items.name: ModelCardName
nested_items.description: The name of the model card.

nested_items.name: ModelCardVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the model card.

nested_items.name: Content
nested_items.description: The content of the model card.

nested_items.name: ModelCardStatus
nested_items.description: The approval status of the model card within your organization. Different organizations might have different criteria for model card review and approval.
Draft: The model card is a work in progress.
PendingReview: The model card is pending review.
Approved: The model card is approved.
Archived: The model card is archived. No more updates should be made to the model card, but it can still be exported.

nested_items.name: SecurityConfig
nested_items.description: The security configuration used to protect model card content.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: A Key Management Service key ID to use for encrypting a model card.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the model card was created.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: Information about the user who created or modified an experiment, trial, trial component, lineage group, project, or model card.

nested_items.name: UserProfileArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: UserProfileName
nested_items.description: The name of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: DomainId
nested_items.description: The domain associated with the user.

nested_items.name: IamIdentity
nested_items.description: The IAM Identity details associated with the user. These details are associated with model package groups, model packages, and project entities only.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: PrincipalId
nested_items.description: The ID of the principal that assumes the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: SourceIdentity
nested_items.description: The person or application which assumes the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the model card was last modified.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedBy
nested_items.description: Information about the user who created or modified an experiment, trial, trial component, lineage group, project, or model card.

nested_items.name: UserProfileArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: UserProfileName
nested_items.description: The name of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: DomainId
nested_items.description: The domain associated with the user.

nested_items.name: IamIdentity
nested_items.description: The IAM Identity details associated with the user. These details are associated with model package groups, model packages, and project entities only.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: PrincipalId
nested_items.description: The ID of the principal that assumes the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: SourceIdentity
nested_items.description: The person or application which assumes the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: ModelCardProcessingStatus
nested_items.description: The processing status of model card deletion. The ModelCardProcessingStatus updates throughout the different deletion steps.
DeletePending: Model card deletion request received.
DeleteInProgress: Model card deletion is in progress.
ContentDeleted: Deleted model card content.
ExportJobsDeleted: Deleted all export jobs associated with the model card.
DeleteCompleted: Successfully deleted the model card.
DeleteFailed: The model card failed to delete.
